Libraries.​classify

A library for handling NPC relationships in a simplified manner.

Functions
SetBase
function classify.SetBase(
id,
base
)

Sets up interitance for an NPC class.

Parameters
npc_class id

The class to configure.

npc_class base

The class to inherit from.

GetDefault
function classify.GetDefault(
ent
)

Gets the default NPC class for an entity.

Parameters
Entity ent

The entity to get the class for.

Returns
npc_class

The default class for this entity, for unconfigured non-NPC entities this will almost always be CLASS_NONE.

GetClass
function classify.GetClass(
ent
)

Gets the current NPC class for an entity.

Parameters
Entity ent

The entity to get the class for.

Returns
npc_class

The current class for this entity.

IsDefault
function classify.IsDefault(
ent
)

Checks whether the entity's NPC class is set to their default.

Parameters
Entity ent

The entity to check.

Returns
bool

Whether the entity's class is set to their default.

Name
function classify.Name(
id
)

Returns a string version of a given NPC class.

Parameters
npc_class id

The class to get the name of.

Returns
string

The class's name.

GetDisposition
function classify.GetDisposition(
self,
target
)

Checks how a class or entity feels about another class or entity.

Parameters
any self

The npc_class or Entity to get the relationship for.

any target

The npc_class or Entity to check.

Returns
number

A D enum.

number

The disposition priority.

AddRelationship
function classify.AddRelationship(
self,
other,
disposition,
priority
)

Specifies a default relationship between one class and another.

Parameters
npc_class self

The class to configure.

npc_class other

The class to add a relationship for.

number disposition

A D enum specifying the relationship.

number priority

The priority to assign to the relationship.

Set
function classify.Set(
target,
class,
force
)

Sets an entity or classname to a specific NPC class.

Parameters
any target

The Entity or classname to configure.

npc_class class

The class to set the target to.

bool? force

Whether to force other entities to update their relationship even when they normally wouldn't.

Reset
function classify.Reset(
target
)

Resets an entity or classname back to their default NPC class.

Parameters
any target

The Entity or classname to reset.

Internal functions
ConfigureNPC
function classify.ConfigureNPC(
npc,
force
)

Updates an NPC's relationships towards other entities.

Parameters
NPC npc

The NPC to configure.

bool? force

Whether to force an update for entities that we would normally skip.

ConfigureEntity
function classify.ConfigureEntity(
ent,
force
)

Updates the relationship of other NPC's towards this entity.

Parameters
Entity ent

The entity to configure.

bool? force

Whether to force an update for NPC's that we would normally skip.

Initialize
function classify.Initialize(
ent,
force
)

Initializes an entity's relationships.

Parameters
Entity ent

The entity to configure.

bool? force

Whether to force relationships to update.
